channel.title: [PI] dialogue options sending dialogue
channel.description: mk so basicly i need this for my quest or else i can't do anything else. i asked this before and i was told to do [code]c.nextChat[/code] but that only brought up compiler errors. previously i believe what was used in my clickingbuttons file was [code]c.dialogueId = ##; c.getDH()sendDialogue(c.dialogueId, ##);[/code] well something like that. if u know how to send a dialogue from a dialogue action or how to make c.nextChat work with this tell me plz =P

item.title: [PI] dialogue options sending dialogue
item.dc:creator: @rrooaarr rrooaarr
item.description:
@rrooaarr wrote:

ty for not answering my question at all =\
all that that thread says is how to make a npc sell items through dialogue…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] dialogue options sending dialogue
item.dc:creator: @diggy diggy
item.description:
@diggy wrote:

http://www.rune*-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/285222-pi-making-npcs-talk-sell-items.html

That’s a very descriptive guide. I followed that and understood it so hopefully you can

Just remove the star (*) and copy/paste in the link and it should work.

Read full topic
